item.title: 开发者提议重构MCP协议，聚焦无状态HTTP与OAuth核心
item.description:
长话短说：开发者David Cramer提出，若重构模型上下文协议（MCP），应仅保留无状态HTTP、OAuth和工具定义等核心部分。他认为当前规范过度工程化，偏离实际需求，且缺乏广泛实现，多数工具构建者会更倾向于简洁方案。

  1. 提议重构MCP协议，剔除非核心功能，仅保留无状态HTTP、OAuth和工具定义。
  2. 批评现有规范过度工程化，未能贴合用户实际需求。
  3. 指出当前协议缺乏实际落地应用，多数工具开发者可能更支持简化版本。

来源：David Cramer推文（数据统计由xgo.ing提供）

item.title: 品牌博客创作利器：LangChain智能助手精准记忆品牌声线
item.description:
长话短说：用户ReidBKimball分享使用LangChain的AgentBuilder工具后，每天早晨6点自动收到一篇符合其品牌声线的优质博客草稿，极大提升了其Meadow Mentor项目的营销效率。该工具特别强调对品牌声线的记忆能力，确保内容风格一致。

  1. LangChain的AgentBuilder能自动生成符合特定品牌声线的博客内容。
  2. 用户设定后，工具每天早晨6点准时推送草稿。
  3. 生成的内容质量优秀，有效助力营销工作。
  4. 用户使用了Gemini 3模型。

来源：ReidBKimball的推文、LangChain官方账号、xgo.ing

item.title: 对内容创作智能体而言，记忆至关重要——它需要记住并学习你的反馈（毕竟第一次很难准确把握调性） / For content creation agents, memory is crucial - needs to remember and learn from your feedback (it’...
item.description:
悉尼·朗克尔（Sydney Runkle）@sydneyrunkle 🤖 我使用 LangChain 的 LangSmith Agent Builder 构建了一个内容创作智能体。📚 我向它输入我们文档和 GitHub 仓库的上下文。✏️ 它会草拟关于新功能、版本发布以及内容（博客、视频）的推文和领英（LinkedIn）帖子。✨ 最棒的部分是：我用过往帖子和表现数据对它进行再训练——这样它就能逐渐了解什么内容能引起我的受众共鸣！🔗 试试 Agent Builder：langchain.com/langsmith/agen… P1L 🔗 查看引用推文 💬 1 🔄 1 ❤️ 3 👀 741 📊 2 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: For content creation agents, memory is crucial - needs to remember and learn from your feedback (it’s not going to nail the right tone the first time) Sydney Runkle @sydneyrunkle 🤖 I built a content creation agent using LangSmith Agent Builder from @LangChain 📚 I feed it context from our docs and GitHub repos. ✏️ It drafts tweets & LinkedIn posts about new features, releases, and content (blogs, videos). ✨ The best part: I retrain it with past posts + performance data — so it learns what resonates with my audience over time! 🔗 Try Agent Builde langchain.com/langsmith/agen… P1L 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 1 🔄 1 ❤️ 3 👀 741 📊 2 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title:
更新博客以澄清这一点 / Updated the blog to clarify this
These types of virtual filesystems are natively supported by deepa...
item.description:
更新博客以澄清这一点：这类虚拟文件系统由 deepagents 原生支持，是其独特特性！未来会尝试更明确地说明。Harrison Chase (@hwchase17) 表示：我本应在博客中澄清（但现在外出且无法用手机编辑文章，请帮忙修复，Elon）：我们并未使用实际文件系统。我们使用 Postgres，但在其上层封装了一个包装器，将其作为文件系统暴露给 LLM。🔗 查看引用推文 💬 2 🔄 1 ❤️ 6 👀 624 📊 3 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: Updated the blog to clarify this These types of virtual filesystems are natively supported by deepagents and is a unique characteristic! Will try to be more explicit about this in the future Harrison Chase @hwchase17 I should have clarified in blog (but am now afk and can’t edit articles from phone, plz fix Elon): We don’t use an actual filesystem. We use Postgres but have a wrapper on top of it expose it to the LLM as a filesystem 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 2 🔄 1 ❤️ 6 👀 624 📊 3 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title:
SQL其实非常有趣 / Sql is actually very interesting
I think sql could be a great interface for some operations. The is...
item.description:
SQL其实非常有趣。我认为SQL可以作为某些操作的绝佳接口。问题在于，目前人们进行的大多数操作都是文本编辑，而SQL在这方面并不擅长。Shreyas Shinde @shreyas1009 @hwchase17 这很有趣。那么对于LLM来说，文件系统应该会比SQL更好吧 🔗 查看引用推文 💬 1 🔄 0 ❤️ 8 👀 867 📊 2 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: Sql is actually very interesting I think sql could be a great interface for some operations. The issue is most of the operations people are currently doing are editing text, for which it’s not great Shreyas Shinde @shreyas1009 @hwchase17 That’s interesting. So file system will be better than sql I guess for llm 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 1 🔄 0 ❤️ 8 👀 867 📊 2 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

Looking at the decision to use skills, subagents, background tasks will be gold. 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 3 🔄 3 ❤️ 4 👀 967 📊 4 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: 智能体构建器的绝佳应用案例！打造一个环境监控智能体，自动监测Slack频道并创建Linear工单 / great use case for agent builder! an ambient agent to monitor slack channel and create linear ticket...
item.description:
智能体构建器的绝佳应用案例！打造一个环境监控智能体，自动监测Slack频道并创建Linear工单。Lauren @ LangChain Docs @docs_plz 文档请求在Slack中总是被淹没 🫠，所以我用LangSmith的智能体构建器创建了一个智能体，它能自动生成Linear工单、提取上下文、链接回讨论串、应用标签并自动分配任务。无需编写代码，只需一个提示！✨ 亲自试试吧：smith.langchain.com/agents?skipOnb… i 🔗 查看引用推文 💬 0 🔄 0 ❤️ 0 👀 418 📊 1 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 提供支持 --- Original: great use case for agent builder! an ambient agent to monitor slack channel and create linear tickets Lauren @ LangChain Docs @docs_plz Docs requests kept getting buried in Slack 🫠 so I built an agent with LangSmith Agent Builder that creates Linear tickets, pulls in context, links back to threads, applies labels, and auto-assigns. No code, just a prompt! ✨ Try it for yourself: smith.langchain.com/agents?skipOnb… i 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 0 🔄 0 ❤️ 0 👀 418 📊 1 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

1. powered by deep agents ...
item.description:
Agent Builder 引擎盖下藏着不少酷炫功能：1. 由深度智能体（Deep Agents）驱动 2. 智能体即文件系统 3. 内置记忆功能 4. 触发器将其转化为环境智能体（Ambient Agent） 5. 提供用于审核和批准智能体工作的信息流 6. 支持 MCPs、技能和子智能体 LangChain @LangChain 🤖LangSmith Agent Builder 技术亮点 昨日我们发布了 LangSmith Agent Builder。以下是其内部运作的快速技术概览（从记忆功能到创新的用户体验）：您的浏览器不支持视频标签。🔗 在 Twitter 上查看 🔗 查看引用推文 💬 1 🔄 3 ❤️ 9 👀 954 📊 3 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: there's a bunch of cool things going on under the hood of agent builder: 1. powered by deep agents 2. agents are a filesystem 3. memory built in 4. triggers turn it into ambient agent 5. a feed for reviewing and approving agent work 6. supports mcps, skills, and subagents LangChain @LangChain 🤖LangSmith Agent Builder Technical Highlights Yesterday we launched LangSmith Agent Builder. Here's a quick technical overview at what is going on under the hood (from memory to an innovative UX): Your browser does not support the video tag. 🔗 View on Twitter 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 1 🔄 3 ❤️ 9 👀 954 📊 3 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title:
✒️ 我如何用 LangSmith Agent Builder 构建AI助手实现邮件自动化 / ✒️How I built an AI agent to automate my emails with LangSmith Agent Builder
LangSmith Agent Builde...
item.description:
✒️ 我如何用 LangSmith Agent Builder 构建AI助手实现邮件自动化 LangSmith Agent Builder 是一款无代码智能体构建工具。我构建了一个邮件助手来监控和回复邮件，过去约三个月一直在使用。它的工作流程如下： 1/ 触发机制：由新邮件触发。无需手动启动——完全自动运行。 2/ 通过MCP调用工具：连接Gmail（读取邮件、发送邮件）和Google日历（读取日历、查看日程、创建日程）。 3/ 人工介入环节：“写入”类操作（发送邮件、创建日程）需经人工确认方可执行。稍后会详述——但想强调它能完全自主运转！ 4/ 子智能体… --- Original: ✒️How I built an AI agent to automate my emails with LangSmith Agent Builder LangSmith Agent Builder is a no-code agent builder. I built an email assistant to monitor and respond to emails, that I've been using for the last ~3 months. Here's what it looks like: 1/ Triggers: it is triggered by incoming emails. I don't have to do any work to kick it off - it just runs automatically 2/ Tools via MCP: connects to gmail (read emails, send email) and gcal (read calendar, read events, create event) 3/ Human in the loop: the "write" actions (sending email, creating calendar) require human approval to run. More on this later - but wanted to highlight that it's able to go completely wild! 4/ Subagent…

item.title: LangSmith / LangSmith
item.description:
LangSmith Astasia Myers @AstasiaMyers 好文章！想到几点：我们是否需要新的基础设施，专门为AI智能体追踪而设计，以支持这个用例？这类似于Datadog如何围绕“指标”概念发展壮大。如果可观测性成为一种协作和产品分析解决方案，对于非AI工程师来说，最佳的视图是什么？🔗 查看引用推文 💬 3 🔄 5 ❤️ 28 👀 9628 📊 7 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 提供支持 --- Original: LangSmith Astasia Myers @AstasiaMyers Great piece! Somethings that came to mind: Do we need new infra that is AI agent trace-native to support this use case? This is similar to how Datadog became large around the concept of a "metric". If observability becomes a collab and product analytics solution, what are the best views for non-AI engineers? 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 3 🔄 5 ❤️ 28 👀 9628 📊 7 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: 重构转向Deep Agents是明智之举 / Refactoring to deepagents is the way
item.description:
重构转向Deep Agents是明智之举 Abhishek Katiyar @abhi__katiyar 我注意到AI智能体开发中存在一个缺口，正为此构建基础设施。结果发现@LangChain的Deep Agents已经完成了一半工作（感谢@Vtrivedy10）。现在决定重构，基于Deep Agents来构建，而不是重复造轮子。很期待大约一周后展示能实现什么成果。🔗 查看引用推文 💬 1 🔄 0 ❤️ 25 👀 4577 📊 5 ⚡ 由xgo.ing驱动 --- Original: Refactoring to deepagents is the way Abhishek Katiyar @abhi__katiyar Was building infra for a gap I noticed in AI agent development. Found @LangChain Deep Agents already built half of it (props to @Vtrivedy10 ). Refactoring to build on Deep Agents instead of reinventing. Excited to show what's possible in a week or so. 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 1 🔄 0 ❤️ 25 👀 4577 📊 5 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: 展示运行轨迹是解释智能体内部机制的最佳方式 / Showing people traces is the best way to explain them what’s going on under the hood of your agent
item.description:
展示运行轨迹是解释智能体内部机制的最佳方式 john kutay @JohnKutay 每当我向稍有技术背景的人展示我们的系统时，大约50%的时间用于介绍用户体验，另外50%则聚焦于运行轨迹。后者往往最能让人恍然大悟。🔗 查看引用推文 💬 2 🔄 3 ❤️ 15 👀 3986 📊 5 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: Showing people traces is the best way to explain them what’s going on under the hood of your agent john kutay @JohnKutay Whenever I’m showing our system to folks who are remotely technical, I spend about 50% of the time of the UX, 50% of the time on the traces. The latter is when most light bulbs go off. 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 2 🔄 3 ❤️ 15 👀 3986 📊 5 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: 需要一篇完整文章论述“追踪记录是智能体优化循环的生命线” / Need a full post on “traces are the lifeblood of agent improvement loops”
item.description:
需要一篇完整文章论述“追踪记录是智能体优化循环的生命线” Viv @Vtrivedy10 的精彩帖子 🔥 追踪记录是智能体优化循环的生命线 迈向“如何改进这个智能体？”的第一步就是“我的智能体在做什么？”——> 开启追踪功能正是启动这个循环的关键 这并非空谈，在 LangChain 我们确实时刻践行这一点，调试智能体的默认流程就是：“能分享追踪记录吗？” 这极大加速了我们的开发循环，因为开发者（通常是我们加上智能体）能立即查看每个工具调用的输入、延迟、令牌消耗等细节，并通过测试修正来对比行为差异 期待未来能见证更多进展，并帮助更多人优化智能体… --- Original: Need a full post on “traces are the lifeblood of agent improvement loops” Viv @Vtrivedy10 banger post 🔥 traces are the lifeblood of agent improvement loops the first step towards “how do i make this agent better?” is “what is my agent doing?” —> turning on tracing is how you kickstart this loop it’s not just talk, at LangChain we literally do this all the time, our default for debugging agents is: “can you share a trace”? it drastically speeds up our development loops because us (usually us + an agent) can immediately see what happened down to each tool call input, latency, tokens, etc and test fizes to compare behavior it’s gonna be a fun time seeing more and helping more ppl improve agents…

item.title: 痕迹至关重要！ / traces matter!
item.description:
痕迹至关重要！Viv（@Vtrivedy10）在Anthropic博客中一如既往地精彩分享，我无法更加强调这一步的重要性——请务必查看智能体（agent）的痕迹！！！理解智能体是否“任务失败”蕴含巨大价值：1. 它是如何失败的？（格式错误、逻辑错误、规划中走错方向、环境错误…）2. 它真的失败了吗？如果结果有误，你是否该更新评估标准？3. 成功模式与失败模式有何不同？（对通过和失败的情况分层分析步骤）4. 将其与你的指令和工具/技能关联起来。你是否未提供合适的工具来完成任务？指令是否模糊？智能体构建是一个深度迭代的过程，而这正是… --- Original: traces matter! Viv @Vtrivedy10 standard awesome Anthropic blog, I cannot stress the importance of this step enough —> pls look at the agent traces!!! TONS of value in understanding if an agent “failed a task” then: 1. how did it fail? (formatting error, logical error, went down wrong track in planning, environment bug…) 2. did it actually fail? should you update your grading if it was wrong? 3. what were successful patterns vs failing patterns (stratify across pass and fail and see the steps) 4. link it back to your instructions and tools/skills. did you not give the right tool to do the task? Are instructions ambiguous? Agent building is a deeply iterative process and this is literally the…

item.title:
文件系统就是一切所需！ / filesystems are all you need!
https://t.co/kUa3BcNKFf
reading this now, good collection of tips &a...
item.description:
文件系统就是一切所需！blog.langchain.com/how-agents-can… 正在阅读，很棒的技巧合集。Cursor（@cursor_ai）的智能体现在为所有模型使用动态上下文。它在保持相同质量的同时，更智能地填充上下文。使用多个MCP服务器时，总令牌数减少了46.9%。🔗 查看引用推文 💬 18 🔄 42 ❤️ 497 👀 70243 📊 154 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 提供支持 --- Original: filesystems are all you need! blog.langchain.com/how-agents-can… reading this now, good collection of tips & tricks Cursor @cursor_ai Cursor's agent now uses dynamic context for all models. It's more intelligent about how context is filled while maintaining the same quality. This reduces total tokens by 46.9% when using multiple MCP servers. 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 18 🔄 42 ❤️ 497 👀 70243 📊 154 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title:
持续学习就是 https://t.co/U1XpV19zdo 加上技能 / Continual learning is https://t.co/U1XpV19zdo plus skills
I kinda agree with this, is it wrong?
item.description:
持续学习就是 agent.md 加上技能，我有点同意这个观点，这不对吗？Daniel Paleka @dpaleka 分享了解决持续学习的方法：1. 长上下文 2. 所有有用的用户或环境反馈都输入到 claude md 3. 当 claude md 中的某个部分过长时，它就变成一个技能。就这样，两层结构，无需微调，别把事情搞复杂了。x.com/bcherny/status… 🔗 查看引用推文 💬 40 🔄 18 ❤️ 209 👀 52917 📊 85 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: Continual learning is agent.md plus skills I kinda agree with this, is it wrong? Daniel Paleka @dpaleka here is how to solve continual learning: 1. long context 2. all useful user or env feedback goes to claude md 3. when a section in claude md is long, it becomes a skill that's it, two levels of hierarchy, no finetuning, don't overcomplicate things. x.com/bcherny/status… 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 40 🔄 18 ❤️ 209 👀 52917 📊 85 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: @thdxr 你是否考虑过让这里的智能体（agent）不只是个Markdown文件？我的使用场景是希望定义一个拥有专属技能、专属MCPs（模型上下文协议），甚至专属子智能体的智能体。虽然我看到一些类似功能的支持（例如 opencode.ai/docs/skills/#o…），但我觉得如果能让一个智能体成为一个文件夹之类的形式，把智能体专属的内容放在里面，会不会更模块化、更便于移植？💬 3 🔄 2 ❤️ 19 👀 4030 📊 9 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 / @thdxr did you ever consider making agents here more than just a markdown file? use case being i wan...

非常喜欢 @opencode 的智能体规范：https://t.co/iypH9WacnJ / really like the agent spec from @opencode: https://t.co/iypH9WacnJ
key feature i like (that as far ...
item.description:
非常喜欢 @opencode 的智能体规范：opencode.ai/docs/agents/。我欣赏的一个关键特性（据我所知，Claude Code 和其他工具目前都不支持）是：能够将这里定义的智能体用作主智能体或子智能体。而 Claude Code 等工具只允许将智能体用作子智能体。如果我想把 Claude Code 改造成一个擅长编写 LangGraph 代码的智能体，我不需要子智能体，我想要的正是这样的功能。💬 15 🔄 19 ❤️ 299 👀 14905 📊 91 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: really like the agent spec from @opencode : opencode.ai/docs/agents/ key feature i like (that as far as i know claude code doesnt support, nor do others): the ability to use an agent defined here as the main agent OR as a subagent cc and others only let you use an agent as a subagent. if i want to turn cc into an agent that is really good at writing langgraph code, i dont want a subagent, i want something like this 💬 15 🔄 19 ❤️ 299 👀 14905 📊 91 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: https://t.co/s3aNKxiJV0 + 技能（skills）——两者都是开放标准，可与智能体框架（如Claude Code、Codex、DeepAgents）结合，基本能定义自定义智能体。目前尚无方法将它们打包整合——Claude插件接近实现，但我想它允许添加agent.md文件。只有我一人想要这个功能吗？还是其他人也想要？💬 52 🔄 76 ❤️ 900 👀 55468 📊 308 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 / https://t.co/s3aNKxiJV0 + skills - both open standards, and can combined with an agent harness (clau...
item.description:
agent.md + 技能（skills）——两者都是开放标准，可与智能体框架（如Claude Code、Codex、DeepAgents）结合，基本能定义自定义智能体。目前尚无方法将它们打包整合——Claude插件接近实现，但我想它允许添加agent.md文件。只有我一人想要这个功能吗？还是其他人也想要？💬 52 🔄 76 ❤️ 900 👀 55468 📊 308 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: agent.md + skills - both open standards, and can combined with an agent harness (claude code, codex, deepagents) can pretty much define a custom agent currently there's no way to package those together - claude plugins is close but i think lets you add an agent.md am i alone in wanting this? or do other people want as well? 💬 52 🔄 76 ❤️ 900 👀 55468 📊 308 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title: LangChain 1.0 以灵活的智能体抽象为核心，既降低了入门门槛，又提升了框架能力（通过“中间件”） / LangChain 1.0 is centered a flexible agent abstraction, which both lowers the floor to entry but als...
item.description:
LangChain 1.0 围绕灵活的智能体抽象设计，不仅降低了入门难度，还通过“中间件”扩展了框架的功能上限。全新学院课程聚焦 LangChain 1.0，全面展示其优势！LangChain @LangChainAI 🔗 新 LangChain 学院课程：LangChain 入门（Python）🔗 学习如何使用 LangChain 构建应用——我们的开源框架让您能轻松基于任何模型提供商开发智能体。本课程中，您将创建具备推理、使用工具和执行能力的智能体，并学习如何通过 LangSmith 调试其行为。过程中您将：- 使用 `create_agent` 抽象构建智能体 - 运用 LangC… --- Original: LangChain 1.0 is centered a flexible agent abstraction, which both lowers the floor to entry but also raises the ceiling of what you can do in a framework (via "middleware") New Academy Course focused on LangChain 1.0, and highlighting all the goodness! LangChain @LangChainAI 🔗 New LangChain Academy Course: Introduction to LangChain (Python) 🔗 Learn how to build with LangChain – our open source framework that makes it easy to start building agents with any model provider. In this course, you’ll create agents that can reason, use tools, and take action, and learn how to debug their behavior with LangSmith. Along the way, you’ll: - Build an agent with the `create_agent` abstraction - Use LangC…

item.title: 长时运行智能体开始奏效——调试新范式初现端倪 / Longer running agents are starting to work - and we're starting to see new patterns for debugging an...
item.description:
长时运行智能体正逐步投入应用，我们也开始观察到调试与优化这类系统的新模式。其中关键一环是让编程智能体能够访问运行轨迹，从而自主诊断问题并提出改进方案。关于这一新范式，我在博客中略有探讨：blog.langchain.com/debugging-deep… 💬 21 🔄 67 ❤️ 542 👀 114941 📊 220 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: Longer running agents are starting to work - and we're starting to see new patterns for debugging and improving them Part of this is making traces accessible to coding agents so they can diagnose and suggest changes Wrote a bit about this new paradigm: blog.langchain.com/debugging-deep… 💬 21 🔄 67 ❤️ 542 👀 114941 📊 220 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

...
item.description:
简而言之，这是在深度代理（deep agents）基础上构建的，因此大量使用了“虚拟”文件系统。我们后续会详细解释其工作原理！Manuel Soria @manuelsoria_ 这看起来太棒了！好奇这些“读取文件 {file_name}”的日志是什么，在讨论串和提示中都能看到——这些是代理可以访问的某种沙盒文件目录的一部分吗？另外，讨论串/轨迹似乎以 md 文件形式保存和读取，真的很想了解其底层机制！抄送 @hwchase17 🔗 查看引用推文 💬 3 🔄 1 ❤️ 27 👀 6838 📊 8 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: The tldr is that this builds on top of deep agents and so heavily utilizes a “virtual” filesystem We will do a write up on how it works at some point! Manuel Soria @manuelsoria_ this looks amazing! wonder what these "reading file {file_name}" logs are, as seen both in threads and in prompts are these part of a kind of sandbox file dir the agent has access to? also the threads/trajectories seem to be saved and read as md files, really curious how this works under the hood! cc @hwchase17 🔗 View Quoted Tweet 💬 3 🔄 1 ❤️ 27 👀 6838 📊 8 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

Agents often involve a lot of back and forth with the user - its not just ...
item.description:
💬分析对话 智能体（Agents）通常需要与用户进行多轮互动——这不仅仅是单一轨迹。Polly 能够审视整个对话过程，判断用户是否感到沮丧，或者智能体是否输出了不良结果。💬 1 🔄 0 ❤️ 9 👀 1346 📊 2 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 驱动 --- Original: 💬Analyze a conversation Agents often involve a lot of back and forth with the user - its not just a single trace Polly can look at the whole conversation and see whether the user was frustrated or if the agent produced bad outputs 💬 1 🔄 0 ❤️ 9 👀 1346 📊 2 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

See how it performs (on par with Claude Code) as...
item.description:
我们在 Terminal Bench 2 上对 DeepAgents CLI 进行了基准测试！看看它的表现（与 Claude Code 相当）以及我们用于测试的开源设置 LangChain @LangChainAI 📊 在 Terminal Bench 2.0 上评估 DeepAgents CLI 📊 DeepAgents CLI 是一个基于 Deep Agents SDK 构建的编码代理，提供交互式终端界面，支持 shell 执行、文件系统工具和持久内存。它在实际任务中表现如何？我们进行了测试！在这篇博客文章中，我们涵盖：⚙️ DeepAgents CLI 是什么 📈 如何使用沙盒代理执行进行隔离评估 🔢 在 Terminal Bench 2.0 任务上的性能评估结果——得分 44.9% 和…… --- Original: We benchmarked DeepAgents CLI on Terminal Bench 2! See how it performs (on par with Claude Code) as well as the open source setup we used to do so LangChain @LangChainAI 📊 Evaluating DeepAgents CLI on Terminal Bench 2.0 📊 The DeepAgents CLI is a coding agent built on top of the Deep Agents SDK, offering an interactive terminal interface with shell execution, filesystem tools, and persistent memory. How well does it actually perform on real-world tasks? We put it to the test! In this blog post, we cover: ⚙️ What the DeepAgents CLI is 📈 How to run isolated evaluations with sandboxed agent execution 🔢 The results from evaluating performance across Terminal Bench 2.0 tasks - scores of 44.9% and…

🫎LangSmith的实际应用 看到开发者在分享新项目时公开他们的追踪链接，这真是太酷了！没有什么比直接查看智能体内部运行情况更好的了，这是理解智能体的绝佳方式 💬 4 🔄 2 ❤️ 36 👀 3644 📊 11 ⚡ 由 xgo.ing 提供支持 --- Original: 🫎LangSmith in the wild Cool to see developers sharing public links of their traces when they share new projects! Nothing better than seeing exactly whats going on under the hood of the agent, great way to understand an agent 💬 4 🔄 2 ❤️ 36 👀 3644 📊 11 ⚡ Powered by xgo.ing

item.title:
面向情境工程的文件系统！ / Filesystems for context engineering!
We wrote a blog on this (below) - glad to see more real world ...
item.description:
面向情境工程的文件系统！我们为此写了一篇博客（如下）——很高兴看到更多现实世界的证据 blog.langchain.com/how-agents-can… Drew Bredvick @DBredvick 基于文件系统的情境工程 TLDR；我们给我们的智能体配备了一台电脑，并加载了与账户相关的文件。它会动态决定需要读取哪些内容。这使我们的每次调用令牌成本从约1.00美元降至约0.25美元（Claude Opus 4.5）。输出效果似乎也更好了（基于初步感受，评估正在进行中）。大语言模型在命令行方面表现出色，何不让它们充分利用呢？示例：[沙盒情境] 为账户找到20个Gong通话ID [沙盒情境] 生成了20个Gong通话文件，文件已写入沙盒。└── gong-calls | └── 2025-… --- Original: Filesystems for context engineering! We wrote a blog on this (below) - glad to see more real world evidence blog.langchain.com/how-agents-can… Drew Bredvick @DBredvick Filesystem based context engineering TLDR; we gave our agent a computer and loaded it with files about the account. It decides what it needs to read dynamically. This brought our token cost down from ~$1.00 per call to ~$0.25 (Claude Opus 4.5). The output seems better too (based on vibes, evals on the way). LLMs are great at the command line, why not let them use it? Example: [Sandbox Context] Found 20 Gong call IDs for account [Sandbox Context] Generated 20 Gong call files files written to sandbox . └── gong-calls | └── 2025-…
